course_description: Master fundamental data structures through hands-on coding exercises. This course focuses on understanding when and how to use different data structures to solve complex problems efficiently.
prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge in any language

module_1.title: Arrays & Dynamic Arrays
module_1.description: Foundation of linear data structures - arrays, lists, and dynamic resizing

module_2.title: Hash Tables Deep Dive
module_2.description: Master hash tables, collision handling, and real-world applications

module_3.title: String Processing & Algorithms
module_3.description: Advanced string manipulation and pattern matching techniques

module_4.title: Mathematical Problem Solving
module_4.description: Apply data structures to solve mathematical and logical challenges

module_5.title: Integration & Optimization
module_5.description: Combine multiple data structures for complex problem solving

module_6.title: Capstone Project
module_6.description: Build a comprehensive project utilizing all learned data structures
